actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to provide for a 50-per centum reduction of the amount of funds available to, of the number of individuals employed as staff for, and of amount of office space and number of telephone lines available for use by any committee of the House of Representatives during the Ninety-eighth Congress.

summary.text: Limits the funds available for House committees of the 98th Congress to 50 percent of the total amount expended for House committees of the second session of the 97th Congress for purposes of investigations, studies, projects, activities, operations, services, and staffing.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for a 50-per centum reduction of the amount of funds available to, of the number of individuals employed as staff for, and of amount of office space and number of telephone lines available for use by any committee of the House of Representatives during the Ninety-eighth Congress.
